job_description:
Position: Sr BI Developer/Analyst

Location: Remote (Hybrid Optional)

Our client, helps leaders succeed by helping them build amazing workplaces, businesses and communities around the world. They do this by thinking differently, sharing innovative ideas and offering a unique and collaborative workplace where you can succeed.

Who You Are

As Senior BI Developer/ Analyst you will be part of a high performing, Enterprise Information Management team that’s working on the company’s data initiatives. You will work closely with the global and regional Architecture teams and be involved in the building and maintenance of the company’s data-related solutions, including the data management and enterprise data warehouse.

You will be an energetic, high aptitude, and self-starting individual who is seeking career growth within a fast-paced, flexible, and rapidly growing company. Communication skills and out-of-the-box thinking is key as exploring new technologies to create innovative solutions is highly encouraged.

What You Bring

Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information systems, or related field; or equivalent work experience
Depth and breadth of technical experience in data architecture, data quality, data integration, data migration, data warehousing/data lake projects, and data analytics.
5-10 years of BI design and development experience in the following: SQL Server (2012 or newer), Power BI, SSAS, SSIS, Enterprise Data Warehouse architecture/development or other BI Stack.
Demonstrated experience in evaluating business processes and recommending improvements.
Experience working in a collaborative and team-oriented environment
Excellent SQL query skills


Bonus Skills And Experience

Familiar with SQL Master Data Services (MDS) and Data Quality Services (DQS)
Experience with Data Lake and AI/ML solutions
Experience in developing within Azure Cloud Services
Knowledge of Dynamics CRM and/or Salesforce


What Success Looks Like

You bring a depth and breadth of technical experience in data architecture, data quality, data integration, data migration, data warehousing/data lake projects, and data analytics.
You will successfully design creative solutions for multiple projects in different Canadian lines of business (data warehouses, etc.) to meet the long-term goals of the organization


Job 67630
